name: Hound Guardian
movement: walks at a speed of 50 feet
description: The Hound Guardian resembles a large, mechanical dog, built for protection and enhanced senses.
memorable: Its loyalty and ability to retaliate against threats to its master make it a unique protector.
goals: To guard its master and eliminate threats.
relations: Often serves as a guardian or protector to spellcasters or other creators.
environment: Commonly found in locations requiring protection, such as labs or homes of its creators.
strengths: Immunities to poison and nonmagical damage enhance its survivability.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma limit its strategic capabilities.
attacks: Bites with piercing damage and can make targets fall prone with a successful hit.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance provides it an advantage against magical attacks.
senses: The Hound Guardian has keen hearing and smell, granting it an advantage on related perception checks.
skills: Proficient in Perception, allowing it to detect hidden threats effectively.
additional_information: Immutable Form prevents alterations to its physical shape.
Constructed Nature allows it to function without air or sustenance.
Can respond to threats targeting its master with Protective Bite.
High Armor Class and decent hit points make it a moderate combatant.
Acts as a loyal defender, enhancing the security of its surroundings.
test_queries: mechanical dog that protects its master
loyal construct guardian with keen senses
swift protector immune to poison damage
Hound Guardian that retaliates when threatened
construct that bites and knocks foes prone
